metadata.description: Name of the the environment which is used to generate a short unique hash used in all resources.

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('keyVaultName'))), createObject('value', parameters('keyVaultName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').keyVaultVaults, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.description: Allow the key vault to be used during resource creation.
Allow the key vault to be used for template deployment.

properties.accessPolicies: [if(not(empty(parameters('principalId'))), createArray(createObject('objectId', parameters('principalId'), 'permissions', createObject('secrets', createArray('get', 'list')), 'tenantId', subscription().tenantId)), createArray())]

parameters.applicationInsightsName: [if(not(empty(parameters('applicationInsightsName'))), createObject('value', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').insightsComponents, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.description: Creates an Application Insights instance and a Log Analytics workspace.
Creates an Application Insights instance based on an existing Log Analytics workspace.
Creates a dashboard for an Application Insights instance.

chart.title: Average processor and process CPU utilization

variables.systemPoolBase: [if(not(empty(parameters('systemPoolConfig'))), parameters('systemPoolConfig'), createObject('vmSize', parameters('systemPoolVmSize'), 'availabilityZones', parameters('systemPoolVmZones'), 'osType', 'Linux', 'osDiskType', parameters('systemPoolVmDiskType'), 'osDiskSizeGB', int(parameters('systemPoolVmDiskSizeGB')), 'maxPods', parameters('nodePoolMaxPods'), 'type', 'VirtualMachineScaleSets', 'enableAutoScaling', true(), 'scaleSetPriority', parameters('systemPoolVmPriority'), 'count', 1, 'minCount', 1, 'maxCount', 3, 'upgradeSettings', createObject('maxSurge', '33%')))]
variables.userPoolBase: [if(not(empty(parameters('userPoolConfig'))), parameters('userPoolConfig'), createObject('vmSize', parameters('userPoolVmSize'), 'osType', 'Linux', 'osDiskType', parameters('userPoolVmDiskType'), 'osDiskSizeGB', int(parameters('userPoolVmDiskSizeGB')), 'maxPods', parameters('nodePoolMaxPods'), 'type', 'VirtualMachineScaleSets', 'enableAutoScaling', true(), 'scaleSetPriority', parameters('userPoolVmPriority'), 'count', 1, 'minCount', 0, 'maxCount', 10))]
variables.agentPoolProfiles: [concat(createArray(union(createObject('name', 'npsystem', 'mode', 'System', 'nodeLabels', createObject('kompox.dev/node-pool', 'system')), variables('systemPoolBase'))), if(contains(parameters('userPoolVmZones'), '1'), createArray(union(createObject('name', 'npuser1', 'mode', 'User', 'availabilityZones', createArray('1'), 'nodeLabels', createObject('kompox.dev/node-pool', 'user', 'kompox.dev/node-zone', '1')), variables('userPoolBase'))), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('userPoolVmZones'), '2'), createArray(union(createObject('name', 'npuser2', 'mode', 'User', 'availabilityZones', createArray('2'), 'nodeLabels', createObject('kompox.dev/node-pool', 'user', 'kompox.dev/node-zone', '2')), variables('userPoolBase'))), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('userPoolVmZones'), '3'), createArray(union(createObject('name', 'npuser3', 'mode', 'User', 'availabilityZones', createArray('3'), 'nodeLabels', createObject('kompox.dev/node-pool', 'user', 'kompox.dev/node-zone', '3')), variables('userPoolBase'))), createArray()))]
